object.description: a tangible and visible entity; an entity that can cast a shadow

food.description: any substance that can be metabolized by an animal to give energy and build tissue

fruit.description: the ripened reproductive body of a seed plant)

apple.description: fruit with red or yellow or green skin and sweet to tart crisp whitish flesh

banana.description: elongated crescent-shaped yellow fruit with soft sweet flesh

watermelon.description: large oblong or roundish melon with a hard green rind and sweet watery red or occasionally yellowish pulp

coffee.description: a beverage consisting of an infusion of ground coffee beans

milk.description: a white nutritious liquid secreted by mammals and used as food by human beings

animal.description: (a living organism characterized by voluntary movement

dog.description: a member of the genus Canis (probably descended from the common wolf) that has been domesticated by man since prehistoric times; occurs in many breeds

cat.description: feline mammal usually having thick soft fur and no ability to roar: domestic cats; wildcats

fish.description: any of various mostly cold-blooded aquatic vertebrates usually having scales and breathing through gills

plant.description: a living organism lacking the power of locomotion

flower.description: reproductive organ of angiosperm plants especially one having showy or colorful parts

grasses.description: narrow-leaved green herbage: grown as lawns; used as pasture for grazing animals; cut and dried as hay

tree.description: a tall perennial woody plant having a main trunk and branches forming a distinct elevated crown; includes both gymnosperms and angiosperms

artifact.description: a man-made object taken as a whole

electronic_device.description: a device that accomplishes its purpose electronically

keyboard.description: device consisting of a set of keys on a piano or organ or typewriter or typesetting machine or computer or the like

mouse.description: a hand-operated electronic device that controls the coordinates of a cursor on your computer screen as you move it around on a pad; on the bottom of the device is a ball that rolls on the surface of the pad

monitor.description: an electronic device that represents information in visual form

clothing.description: a covering designed to be worn on a person's body

hat.description: headdress that protects the head from bad weather; has shaped crown and usually a brim

shoe.description: footwear shaped to fit the foot (below the ankle) with a flexible upper of leather or plastic and a sole and heel of heavier material

shirt.description: a garment worn on the upper half of the body
